subsections.title: 1.1 Personal Details
subsections.content: We collect personal details you provide when using OnlineMedic, including:
list: Full Name
Email Address
Login Credentials (e.g., username and password)
Appointment details (e.g., session dates and therapist preferences)

subsections.title: 1.2 Chat Interactions
subsections.content: Conversations with our AI assistant may be recorded and stored temporarily for:
list: Enhancing response accuracy and functionality.
Improving user engagement and experience.

subsections.title: 1.3 Activity Data
subsections.content: We may gather technical data on how you interact with our platform, such as:
list: IP Address
Device Type and Browser Version
Operating System Information
Page visits, session duration, and engagement analytics

subsections.title: 1.4 Cloud Storage
subsections.content: OnlineMedic integrates with cloud-based services for authentication, user session tracking, and system diagnostics. These services adhere to strict security protocols.

sections.title: 2. How We Utilize Your Information
list: Account verification and authentication processes.
Managing and securing appointment scheduling and modifications.
Delivering AI-generated support and therapeutic insights.
Enhancing chatbot performance through analysis and refinement.
Monitoring platform performance to improve service quality.
Troubleshooting technical errors and ensuring system stability.
Sending important notifications, reminders, and session confirmations.
Providing user assistance and responding to inquiries.

sections.title: 3. How We Safeguard Your Data
list: Encryption: All data exchanges between users and our platform are secured using encryption protocols such as HTTPS.
Restricted Access: Only authorized team members can access sensitive information.
Data Protection: Secure encryption techniques safeguard passwords and confidential records.
AI Anonymization: Chatbot interactions are anonymized and temporarily stored solely for system enhancement.

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing Policies
sections.content: We do not sell or distribute personal data except when required for service delivery or legal compliance:
list: Technology Providers: Trusted third-party partners (e.g., cloud services) assist in platform operations.
Legal Obligations: Information may be disclosed in cases where laws or safety concerns require it.

sections.title: 5. Data Retention
list: User Information: Personal details remain stored as long as your account is active or as required for service obligations.
Chat Data: AI interactions are anonymized and stored briefly for quality improvements, then deleted after 30 days.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
sections.content: As an OnlineMedic user, you have the following rights:
list: Data Access: Request a copy of your personal data stored on our platform.
Information Updates: Request corrections to any inaccurate or outdated details.
Account Deletion: Request the removal of your personal records, subject to policy constraints.
Privacy Preferences: Opt out of non-essential data collection for analytics or marketing.

sections.title: 7. AI Chatbot Notice
sections.content: Our AI assistant offers general mental wellness guidance but does not replace professional therapy or medical treatment. Always consult a licensed therapist or healthcare professional for personalized advice.

sections.title: 8. Cookies & Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies and tracking tools to:
list: Optimize user experience and platform responsiveness.
Analyze user activity for service enhancements.
sections.additionalInfo: You can manage cookie settings through your browser preferences.

sections.title: 9. Third-Party Websites
sections.content: OnlineMedic may feature external links to other websites. We do not control their privacy policies and recommend reviewing their terms before sharing personal data.

sections.title: 10. Policy Modifications
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in regulations or operational improvements. The latest version will always be available on this page, with the effective date clearly indicated.

sections.title: 11. Contact Details
sections.content: For inquiries or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at:
list: Email: support@onlinemedic.com
Address: USIU Road
